sqlUnit.name: get_name_fields
sqlUnit.sql: select name from t_form_field where table_name=:tableName

sqlUnit.name: form_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='FORM_TYPE')) as type, t.field_num,u.full_name,t.create_time from t_form t,t_n_user u where t.creator=u.id [ and t.name like '%:name%'] [ and t.type=:type] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: del_form
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_form where id in(:id); delete from t_form_field where form_id in(:id)

sqlUnit.name: form_table_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.table_name,t.remark,u.full_name,t.create_time,(select count(*) from t_create_table_field t2 where t2.table_id=t.id) as num from t_create_table t,t_n_user u where t.user_id = u.id [ and (t.table_name like '%:name%' or t.remark like '%:name%')] [ and u.org_id in(:orgIds)]

sqlUnit.name: table_item
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.table_name,t.remark from t_create_table t order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: table_fields
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.field_name,t.field_remark from t_create_table_field t where t.table_id=:id order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: get_table_fields_value_map
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.`plugins`,t.table_id,ft.table_name,t.table_field_id,ftf.field_name from t_form_field t,t_create_table ft,t_create_table_field ftf where t.form_id=:formId and t.table_id=ft.id and t.table_field_id=ftf.id order by t.`plugins` desc

sqlUnit.name: form_helper_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select fh.id,fh.title, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=fh.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state ,u.full_name,fh.create_time from t_form_helper fh,t_n_user u where fh.user_id=u.id [ and fh.title like '%:title%'] [ and fh.state=:state ] order by fh.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: get_form_helper_items
sqlUnit.sql: select fh.id,fh.title from t_form_helper fh where fh.state=1 order by fh.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: get_table_fields
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_create_table_field t where t.id in(:ids)

sqlUnit.name: get_tablename_fieldname_byfieldid
sqlUnit.sql: select t.table_name,tf.field_name from t_create_table_field tf,t_create_table t where tf.table_id=t.id and tf.id=:fieldId

sqlUnit.name: get_field_value
sqlUnit.sql: select ${fieldName} from ${tableName} where form_data_id=:formDataId

sqlUnit.name: get_institle_fieldid_by_form
sqlUnit.sql: select t.table_field_id from t_form_field t where t.form_id=:formId and t.is_institle='1'

sqlUnit.name: update_field_value
sqlUnit.sql: update ${tableName} set ${fieldName} where form_data_id=:formDataId

sqlUnit.name: log_field_info
sqlUnit.sql: select ff.table_id as tableId,ct.table_name as tableName,ctf.field_name as tableFieldName, ff.table_field_id as tableFieldId,ff.plugins from t_form_field ff,t_create_table ct,t_create_table_field ctf where ff.table_id=ct.id and ff.table_field_id=ctf.id and ff.is_log=1 and ff.form_id=:formId

sqlUnit.name: form_resource_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.uri,(select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state, t.create_time from t_n_resource t where t.type='form_resource' order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_form_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.name from t_form t where t.type='normal_form' order by t.create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: form_attachment_list
sqlUnit.sql: select fa.id,fa.attachment_id,a.file_name,a.file_size,a.file_suffix,a.create_time,u.full_name,a.user_id from t_form_attachment fa,t_n_attachment a,t_n_user u where fa.attachment_id=a.id and a.user_id = u.id [ and fa.form_data_id=:formDataId] [ and fa.form_id=:formId and a.user_id=:userId and (fa.form_data_id is null or fa.form_data_id = '')]

sqlUnit.name: update_form_data_id
sqlUnit.sql: update t_form_attachment set form_data_id=:formDataId where form_data_id=:tmplFormDataId

sqlUnit.name: get_form_att_infos_byid
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id as attId, fa.id as fattId,t.file_name,t.file_size,t.file_suffix,t.create_time from t_n_attachment t,t_form_attachment fa where t.id=fa.attachment_id and t.id in(:ids)

sqlUnit.name: get_form_instance_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.title,u.full_name,t.create_time,t.form_id, t.form_data_id from t_form_instance t,t_n_user u,t_form f where t.form_id=f.id and t.user_id=u.id [ and (t.title like '%:name%' or f.name like '%:name%')] order by t.create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: get_table_name
sqlUnit.sql: select distinct tct.table_name from t_form_field ft,t_create_table tct where ft.form_id=:formId and ft.table_id=tct.id

sqlUnit.name: del_form_data
sqlUnit.sql: delete from ${table} where form_data_id=:formDataId

sqlUnit.name: update_form_inst_title
sqlUnit.sql: update t_form_instance set title=:title where form_data_id=:formDataId

sqlUnit.name: get_expire_form_attachment
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_form_attachment t where t.form_data_id like 'NEW_%' and t.create_timestamp <:expireTime

sqlUnit.name: get_table_fields_by_plugin
sqlUnit.sql: select ct.table_name,ctf.field_name from t_form_field ff, t_create_table ct,t_create_table_field ctf where ff.table_id = ct.id and ff.table_field_id = ctf.id and ff.form_id=:formId and ff.plugins in(:plugins)

sqlUnit.name: get_form_att_by_attid
sqlUnit.sql: select t.* from t_form_attachment t where t.attachment_id in(:attIds)

sqlUnit.name: get_form_att_by_formdataid
sqlUnit.sql: select t.* from t_form_attachment t where t.form_data_id=:formDataId
